description:
Honoka decides to take Millie on a short vacation out in the desert after Paife tells her Millie was found asleep at school. At the same time, a hunter named Leon seeks out Honoka. He wants her to guide him in his search for the legendary "fairy" of the desert...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 砂漠の伝説(フォークロア)
